title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: Skyrim is an action role-playing game set in an open world environment, allowing the player to explore freely and complete quests.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Breath of the Wild is an action-adventure game set in an open world where players control Link, who awakens from a century-long slumber to defeat Calamity Ganon.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: GTA V is an action-adventure game played from either a third-person or first-person perspective. Players complete missions—linear scenarios with set objectives—to progress through the story.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is a Western-themed action-adventure game set in an open world environment. It follows outlaw Arthur Morgan as he navigates through the Van der Linde gang's decline at the turn of the 20th century.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an action RPG where players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter known as a Witcher. Players battle the game's many dangers with weapons and magic, interact with non-player characters, and complete quests to acquire experience points and gold.

title: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Super Mario Odyssey is a platform game in which players control Mario as he travels across various worlds known as 'Kingdoms' on the hat-shaped ship 'Odyssey', in an effort to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, who plans to forcibly marry her.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a sandbox video game that enables players to build constructions out of textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world. Other activities in the game include exploration, resource gathering, crafting, and combat.

title: Overwatch
description: Overwatch is a team-based multiplayer first-person shooter where players select from a roster of heroes and compete to complete objectives. The game features squad-based combat with two opposing teams of six players each.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action-adventure game set in the futuristic Night City, where players assume the first-person perspective of a customizable mercenary known as V, who can acquire skills in hacking and machinery with options for melee and ranged combat.

title: Fortnite
description: Fortnite is an online video game developed by Epic Games and released in 2017. It is available in three distinct game mode versions that otherwise share the same general gameplay and game engine: Fortnite: Save the World, a cooperative shooter-survival game for up to four players to fight off zombie-like creatures and defend objects with fortifications they can build; Fortnite Battle Royale, a free-to-play battle royale game where up to 100 players fight to be the last person standing; and Fortnite Creative, where players are given complete freedom to create worlds and battle arenas.
